name: unifile-common-tools
description: Common tools for Unifile connectors. Don't require it directly
author: Jean-Baptiste Richardet <jeanbaptiste.richardet@gmail.com> (https://github.com/JbIPS)

scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run lint && npm run
scripts.version: LIB_VERSION=$(env | grep npm_package_version | grep -v script | cut -d= -f2); sed -e "s/Unreleased/$LIB_VERSION/" -e "s/HEAD/v$LIB_VERSION/" -e "/^## \[$LIB_VERSION/ s/$/ - $(date +%Y-%m-%d)/" CHANGELOG.md -i && git add CHANGELOG.md package.json
